18/*********************
19 * DEFINES
20 *********************/
21#define INTERNAL_SMALL_MARGIN 8
22
23/**********************
24 * TYPEDEFS
25 **********************/
26enum {
27 EXIT_BUTTON_INDEX = 0,
28 PREVIOUS_PAGE_INDEX,
29 NEXT_PAGE_INDEX,
30 NB_MAX_CHILDREN
31};
32

34 * STATIC VARIABLES

37/**********************

41/**********************
42 * STATIC PROTOTYPES
43 **********************/
44
45static void configButtons(nbgl_container_t *navContainer, uint8_t navNbPages, uint8_t navActivePage)
46{
47 nbgl_button_t *buttonPrevious = (nbgl_button_t *) navContainer->children[PREVIOUS_PAGE_INDEX];
48 nbgl_button_t *buttonNext = (nbgl_button_t *) navContainer->children[NEXT_PAGE_INDEX];
49
50 buttonPrevious->foregroundColor = (navActivePage == 0) ? LIGHT_GRAY : BLACK;
51 buttonNext->foregroundColor = (navActivePage == (navNbPages - 1)) ? LIGHT_GRAY : BLACK;
52}
53
54/**********************
55 * GLOBAL FUNCTIONS
56 **********************/
57
67bool nbgl_navigationCallback(nbgl_obj_t *obj,
68 nbgl_touchType_t eventType,
69 uint8_t nbPages,
70 uint8_t *activePage)
71{
72 nbgl_container_t *navContainer;
73
74 if (eventType != TOUCHED) {
75 return false;
76 }
77 navContainer = (nbgl_container_t *) obj->parent;
78
79 if (obj == navContainer->children[EXIT_BUTTON_INDEX]) {
80 // fake page when Quit button is touched
81 *activePage = EXIT_PAGE;
82 return true;
83 }
84 else if (obj == navContainer->children[PREVIOUS_PAGE_INDEX]) {
85 if (*activePage > 0) {
86 *activePage = *activePage - 1;
87 configButtons(navContainer, nbPages, *activePage);
88 return true;
89 }
90 }
91 else if (obj == navContainer->children[NEXT_PAGE_INDEX]) {
92 if (*activePage < (nbPages - 1)) {
93 *activePage = *activePage + 1;
94 configButtons(navContainer, nbPages, *activePage);
95 return true;
96 }
97 }
98 return false;
99}
100
112nbgl_container_t *nbgl_navigationPopulate(uint8_t nbPages,
113 uint8_t activePage,
114 bool withExitKey,
115 uint8_t layer)
116{
117 nbgl_button_t *button;
118 nbgl_container_t *navContainer;
119
120 navContainer = (nbgl_container_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(CONTAINER, layer);
121 navContainer->obj.area.width = SCREEN_WIDTH - 2 * BORDER_MARGIN;
122 navContainer->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER + 2 * BORDER_MARGIN;
123 navContainer->layout = HORIZONTAL;
124 navContainer->nbChildren = NB_MAX_CHILDREN;
125 navContainer->children = (nbgl_obj_t **) nbgl_containerPoolGet(navContainer->nbChildren, layer);
126 navContainer->obj.alignmentMarginX = 0;
127 navContainer->obj.alignmentMarginY = 0;
128 navContainer->obj.alignment = NO_ALIGNMENT;
129
130 if (withExitKey) {
131 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layer);
132 button->innerColor = WHITE;
133 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
134 button->obj.area.width = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
135 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
136 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
137 button->text = NULL;
138 button->icon = &C_cross32px;
139 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = 0;
140 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = 0;
141
142 button->obj.alignment = (nbPages > 1) ? MID_LEFT : CENTER;
143 button->obj.alignTo = NULL;
144 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
145 button->obj.touchId = BOTTOM_BUTTON_ID;
146 navContainer->children[EXIT_BUTTON_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
147 }
148 if (nbPages > 1) {
149 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layer);
150 button->innerColor = WHITE;
151 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
152 button->obj.area.width
153 = (SCREEN_WIDTH - (2 * BORDER_MARGIN + 2 * INTERNAL_SMALL_MARGIN + BUTTON_DIAMETER))
154 / 2;
155 if (!withExitKey) {
156 button->obj.area.width += BUTTON_DIAMETER / 2;
157 }
158 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
159 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
160 button->text = NULL;
161 button->icon = &C_leftArrow32px;
162 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = 0;
163 if (withExitKey) {
164 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = INTERNAL_SMALL_MARGIN;
165 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
166 button->obj.alignTo = navContainer->children[EXIT_BUTTON_INDEX];
167 }
168 else {
169 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = 0;
170 button->obj.alignment = MID_LEFT;
171 button->obj.alignTo = NULL;
172 }
173 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
174 button->obj.touchId = LEFT_BUTTON_ID;
175 navContainer->children[PREVIOUS_PAGE_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
176
177 // create next page button
178 button = (nbgl_button_t *) nbgl_objPoolGet(BUTTON, layer);
179 button->innerColor = WHITE;
180 button->borderColor = LIGHT_GRAY;
181 button->foregroundColor = BLACK;
182 button->obj.area.width
183 = (SCREEN_WIDTH - (2 * BORDER_MARGIN + 2 * INTERNAL_SMALL_MARGIN + BUTTON_DIAMETER))
184 / 2;
185 if (!withExitKey) {
186 button->obj.area.width += BUTTON_DIAMETER / 2;
187 }
188 button->obj.area.height = BUTTON_DIAMETER;
189 button->radius = BUTTON_RADIUS;
190 button->text = NULL;
191 button->icon = &C_rightArrow32px;
192 button->obj.alignmentMarginX = INTERNAL_SMALL_MARGIN;
193 button->obj.alignmentMarginY = 0;
194 button->obj.alignment = MID_RIGHT;
195 button->obj.alignTo = navContainer->children[PREVIOUS_PAGE_INDEX];
196 button->obj.touchMask = (1 << TOUCHED);
197 button->obj.touchId = RIGHT_BUTTON_ID;
198 navContainer->children[NEXT_PAGE_INDEX] = (nbgl_obj_t *) button;
199
200 configButtons(navContainer, nbPages, activePage);
201 }
202
203 return navContainer;
204}
